name: Flight of the Butterfly
description:
A Melody Game Jam

Team:
Unity dev: Jill Hoffman
UI: Ken Annan
SFX: Philip Vasta

Rules :
1) Wear Headphones 
the music is your guide, stay on the path or you might get eaten

2) Collect Nectar
by visiting flowers

3) Find Mate 
after you have collected enough nectar

Use wasd or arrow keys to move
